paper_abstract: The aim of this paper is to correct a result about a class of implications in interval-valued fuzzy set theory introduced in paper-Fuzzy Sets and Systems 153 (2005) 229-248. The properties of the modified implications are also discussed. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on implicators based on binary aggregation operators in interval-valued fuzzy set theory
